info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 4:38PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Nolan and northwestern Taylor Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 437 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms 8 miles south of Trent and 3 miles south of Merkel, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Merkel, Tye, Trent, View, Dyess Afb and Camp Butman. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 254 and 278. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
